instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Hij en zijn vrouw zorgen nu voor vijf verweesde neven en nichten.
output: Juntamente com a esposa, este homem tem agora a seu cargo cinco sobrinhos órfãos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De ontwikkelingslanden moeten uiteraard niet eenvoudigweg de belastingstelsels van ontwikkelde economieën kopiëren.
output: Naturalmente, os países em desenvolvimento não devem simplesmente imitar os sistemas fiscais dos países desenvolvidos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De modellen die de Fed (evenals andere centrale banken en officiële instellingen als het Internationale Monetaire Fonds) gebruikt om de inflatie onder controle te houden gaan allemaal uit van het bestaan van een van te voren vastgestelde limiet aan het werkloosheidspercentage.
output: Os modelos de metas de inflação utilizados pela Fed (e outros bancos centrais e instituições oficiais, como o Fundo Monetário Internacional) assumem a existência de algum limite pré-determinado para o desemprego não inflacionista.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In de toekomst zullen – net als in het verleden – de meest arbeidsintensieve banen worden gevonden in de bouw van huizen en productiefaciliteiten, en in het levend maken en houden van menselijke gemeenschappen.
output: No futuro, como no passado, os empregos de trabalho mais intensivo envolverão a construção de casas, instalações de produção e, por sua vez, de comunidades.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Het is duidelijk dat de G-20 er goed aan doet te benadrukken hoe belangrijk de tegemoetkoming aan deze behoeften voor heel veel mensen is.
output: Obviamente, o G20 tem razão em sublinhar a importância de dar resposta a estas necessidades e o número de pessoas que carecem desta acção.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De behandelingsrichtlijnen moeten deze informatie bevatten en aan alle verstrekkers van antibiotica worden gegeven.
output: As diretrizes de tratamento devem incorporar estas informações e ser transmitidas a todos os fornecedores de antibióticos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De ervaringen bij eerdere vredesbesprekingen met de FARC duidden op een neiging tot het manipuleren van onderhandelingen om nationale en internationale legitimiteit te verwerven, zonder werkelijk bereid te zijn tot het sluiten van een deal.
output: A conduta das FARC em negociações de paz anteriores revela uma tendência para manipular as negociações no sentido de obter legitimidade nacional e internacional sem realmente estarem dispostas a chegar a um acordo.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Sceptici en tegenstanders van de onderhandelingen hadden echter een punt.
output: No entanto, as opiniões contrárias e cépticas têm alguma razão de ser.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Maar ondanks deze empirische weerlegging bleek de ideologische aantrekkingskracht van het monetarisme, gesteund door het veronderstelde gezag van “rationele” verwachtingen, overweldigend.
output: Mas, apesar da refutação empírica, a atração ideológica do monetarismo, apoiada pela suposta autoridade das expectativas “racionais”, revelou ser esmagadora.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Ze hadden allemaal een andere bijdrage, afhankelijk van de specifieke omstandigheden van het land en de voorwaarden van de Duitse heerschappij.
output: Cada uma destas sociedades deu uma contribuição diferente, em função das circunstâncias e das condições específicas do regime alemão em cada país.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Hij zou tenslotte een prima leven kunnen leiden door alleen maar twee klassen per semester te onderwijzen en vanuit zijn luie stoel advies te geven in academische publicaties.
output: Afinal de contas, ele poderia ter uma boa vida apenas a ensinar duas turmas por semestre e a ser conselheiro de secretária nas revistas académicas.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In de tweede plaats zijn de Amerikaanse multinationals de afgelopen tien jaar in het buitenland harder gegroeid dan in de VS zelf.
output: Segundo, durante a década de 2000, as multinacionais dos EUA expandiram-se mais depressa no estrangeiro que domesticamente.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Ik heb geen publiek als Gates of Annan, maar ik zou mijn stem graag bij die van hun voegen.
output: Eu não tenho a mesma audiência que Gates ou que Annan têm, mas gostaria de juntar a minha voz à deles.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Toen het Global Fund tien jaar geleden opgericht werd, groeide de verspreiding van HIV over hele de wereld en de medicijnen om het virus te bestrijden waren nog veel te duur.
output: Quando o Fundo Global foi criado há uma década, a incidência do VIH estava a crescer no mundo, e os medicamentos usados para tratar o vírus eram ainda proibitivamente dispendiosos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Tegen deze achtergrond zijn Israel en de Palestijnse Gebieden relatief stabiele plekken.
output: Perante este cenário, Israel e os territórios palestinos são lugares relativamente estáveis.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Ik hoop dat armoedebestrijders zich uiteindelijk niet zullen laten tegenhouden door de ervaringen van het MVP om te investeren en risico’s te nemen.
output: No final, espero que quem luta contra a pobreza não deixe que a experiência do MVP os impeça de investir e correr riscos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Bovendien verminderde het aantal kantoor- en administratieve banen tijdens de recessie na 2008 met 8%, de productie- en handwerkbanen met 17% en de plekken voor machine-operators, constructeurs en arbeiders met 15%.
output: Além disso, durante a Grande Recessão, os postos de trabalho em escritório e funções administrativas diminuíram 8%, as funções na produção e actividades artesanais sofreram uma queda de 17% e o número de vagas para operadores de máquinas, fabricantes e operários desceu 15%.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Toen buitenlandse bedrijven die naar China exporteerden betalingen in yuan accepteerden, kwamen grote hoeveelheden Chinese valuta terecht op bankrekeningen in Hong Kong.
output: À medida que as firmas estrangeiras que exportavam para a China foram aceitando pagamentos em renminbi, a moeda acumulou-se nas suas contas bancárias de Hong Kong.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Tegelijkertijd heeft de groeiende omzet in het buitenland van deze multinationals hun Amerikaanse werknemersbestand een steun in de rug gegeven als het gaat om activiteiten als reclame, ontwerp, Rampamp;D en management.
output: Ao mesmo tempo, as suas vendas crescentes no exterior impulsionaram o seu emprego nos EUA em actividades como a publicidade, o design, Iampamp;D, e gestão.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Ik behoor tot de generatie die veertig jaar geleden de overgang van dictatuur naar democratie in mijn land heeft meegemaakt.
output: Eu faço parte da geração do meu país que viveu a transição da ditadura para a democracia há quatro décadas.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Nederland, Duitsland en de VS hebben al Patriot-raketten ingezet aan de Zuidoostgrens van de NAVO om Turkije te helpen verdedigen en beschermen tegen mogelijke raketaanvallen uit Syrië.
output: Os Países Baixos, a Alemanha, e os EUA já instalaram mísseis Patriot na fronteira sudeste da OTAN, para ajudar a defender e proteger a Turquia de possíveis ataques de mísseis Sírios.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Met dit gegeven in het achterhoofd zouden subsidies voor start-ups gecombineerd moeten worden met gesubsidieerde ondernemingsstages, zoals die tientallen jaren (en soms eeuwen) training hebben geboden voor metselaars, timmerlieden, loodgieters en elektriciens.
output: Perante este contexto, os subsídios de arranque deverão ser conjugados com acções subsidiadas de aprendizagem em matéria de empreendedorismo, à semelhança do que acontece há décadas (e, em alguns casos, há séculos) com as profissões de pedreiro, carpinteiro, canalizador e electricista.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Een slecht ontworpen beleid kan de nauwkeurigheid van de gegevens eveneens ondermijnen.
output: A deficiente concepção de políticas também afecta a exactidão dos dados.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Bovendien zou welke overeenkomst dan ook expliciet het aanbod van onderwijs en mogelijkheden voor professionele ontwikkeling voor de geworven gezondheidswerkers moeten omvatten.
output: Além disso, qualquer acordo deve exigir explicitamente a oferta de oportunidades de educação e desenvolvimento profissional para os trabalhadores de saúde recrutados.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Gelukkig zijn er geen aanwijzingen dat er besmettingen hebben plaatsgevonden, maar in de toekomst zullen we misschien minder geluk hebben.
output: Felizmente, não há provas de contágio, mas poderemos não ter tanta sorte no futuro.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In samenwerking met de Wereldbank, de WHO, UNICEF en de Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation heeft de alliantie innovatieve financiële instrumenten gebruikt om fondsen te werven voor mondiale vaccinatieprogramma's en met de sector samengewerkt om de prijzen van vaccins omlaag te krijgen.
output: Em parceria com o Banco Mundial, a OMS, a UNICEF e a Fundação Bill & Melinda Gates têm utilizado ferramentas inovadoras de financiamento, de modo a arrecadarem fundos para os programas de imunização mundiais, enquanto negociam com a indústria para baixar os preços das vacinas.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Precies zoals de publieke perceptie de politieke vooruitzichten van Sarkozy ondermijnt, drijft deze de onweerstaanbare opkomst van Juppé aan.
output: Do mesmo modo que as percepções públicas estão a enfraquecer as perspectivas políticas de Sarkozy, também estão a alimentar a irresistível ascensão de Juppé.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In de twintigste eeuw is de sociale mobiliteit in alle hogeinkomenslanden langzaam maar gestaag toegenomen, waarbij schoolprestaties en beroepsmatige status minder afhingen van de gezinsachtergrond en méér van de cognitieve vermogens en andere persoonlijke kenmerken.
output: Durante o século XX, a mobilidade social aumentou, de forma lenta mas firme, em todos os países com rendimentos elevados e o desempenho escolar e o estatuto profissional dependiam menos dos antecedentes familiares e mais das competências cognitivas e de outras características pessoais.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Tijdens deze bijeenkomst zal het Panel een “stoutmoedige, maar praktische” visie ontvouwen voor gezamenlijke actie op het gebied van de duurzame ontwikkeling.
output: Na reunião, o Painel irá estabelecer uma visão “arrojada, mas no entanto prática” para uma acção conjunta no desenvolvimento sustentável.
